description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in NinjaTeam Click to Chat – WP Support All-in-One Floating Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Click to Chat – WP Support All-in-One Floating Widget: from n/a through 2.3.3.

product.name: Click to Chat – WP Support All-in-One Floating Widget
